sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The Christian sacrifice by Iames Barker ... Barker, James, fl. 1639.
[20], 148 [i.e. 152], [4] p.
Printed for Humphry Blunden neare ye Rroyall [sic] Exchange in Cornehill, London : 1630 [i.e. 1639]
Engraved title page. Publication date on title page erroneous; actual publication date from STC. A treatise on Pro. 23:26. Pages 110-11 transposed in numbering; 144 repeated in number, and erroneous numbering continues; 152, final numbered page, misnumbered 148. Signatures: A-G¹² H⁶ (-A1-2, blank?). Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======

[20], 148 [i.e. 152], [4] p.
Printed for Humphry Blunden neare ye Rroyall [sic] Exchange in Cornehill, London : 1630 [i.e. 1639]
Engraved title page. Publication date on title page erroneous; actual publication date from STC. A treatise on Pro. 23:26. Pages 110-11 transposed in numbering; 144 repeated in number, and erroneous numbering continues; 152, final numbered page, misnumbered 148. Signatures: A-G¹² H⁶ (-A1-2, blank?). Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
Humphry Blunden
ye Rroyall [sic] Exchange in Cornehill
